Text: Thank you for taking the time to share this with those of us that can not watch F1 by any other means. BBC has the better of the two presentations, agian many thanks.
it's a shame that Martin Brundle isn't comentating on bbc this season. With Coulthard they were the best comentator duo ever.

Thank you so much for your uploads!!!
